components/common/modal: ×
components/common/polyfill-script:
<script>
    {{!--
        Check for modern browser features, and load polyfills if browser does not appear to support features
        we need.

            Polyfill approach is all or nothing - please import needed polyfills in /assets/js/polyfills.js

        Inspired by https://philipwalton.com/articles/loading-polyfills-only-when-needed/
            --}}
    function browserSupportsAllFeatures() {
        return window.Promise
            && window.fetch
            && window.URL
            && window.URLSearchParams
            && window.WeakMap
            // object-fit support
            && ('objectFit' in document.documentElement.style);
    }

    function loadScript(src) {
        var js = document.createElement('script');
        js.src = src;
        js.onerror = function () {
            console.error('Failed to load polyfill script ' + src);
        };
        document.head.appendChild(js);
    }

    if (!browserSupportsAllFeatures()) {
        loadScript('{{cdn 'assets/dist/theme-bundle.polyfills.js'}}');
    }
</script>

components/custom/project-builder/choose:
Choose Your Project

Countertop

Looking to remodel your kitchen or renovate your home's countertops? Discover the revolutionary leader in epoxy countertops and resin woodworking - Stone Coat Countertops! Our high-quality, scratch-resistant, heat-resistant, impact-resistant, and zero VOC! Stone Epoxy Countertops are designed to withstand everything your family encounters. From hot plates and accidental falls to scrapes and scratches, our epoxy countertop products are built to last. Create something extraordinary with Stone Coat Countertops. Start your project today!

components/custom/project-builder/counte:
Project Calculator

All fields must be filled out and be above zero

How to pour epoxy over any surface

{{> components/custom/project-builder/modals/help-calculate }}

Countertop Color Finish

What is your color system

Select your colors

Help me choose

Select from any pre-built epoxy countertop color finish above. If you don't find one you want, select CUSTOM (select your own colors) to create a countertop finish that's uniquely yours.

Each pre-built Epoxy Countertop Finish Kit comes with:

  • Stone Coat Countertop Epoxy or Art Coat Epoxy
  • Polycolor Metallic Powders
  • Liquid Epoxy Dye Colors
  • Epoxy Undercoat
  • Your choice of Top Coat Finish
{{> components/custom/project-builder/modals/help-choose-surface }}

Baltic Brown

Black Exotic Marble

Black Galaxy

Black Marble

Blue Fractured Granite

Caramel Marble

Carrara Marble Exotic

Natural Earth Tones

White Exotic Marble

Project Surface

What is your project surface?

Help me choose

If your countertops are in good condition, cover them with Stone Coat Epoxy instead of building new ones from MDF. Save time and money while achieving a beautiful new countertop finish.

If your countertops are damaged, deteriorating or maybe you're starting from scratch, it may be time to build new ones. We'll guide you through the entire process, ensuring your project is a success.

What undercoat do you need?

Help me choose

Our high bond, ammonia-free paint is perfect for coloring your substrate before you pour. Pick you Undercoat Color based off the color of your countertop pour. White or light countertops use white undercoat. Grey or neutral countertops will use grey undercoat. Black or dark countertops will use black undercoat.

{{> components/custom/project-builder/modals/help-choose-surface }}

How to pour epoxy over any surface

Top Coat Options

Choose your countertop top coat

Help me choose

For maximum durability opt for our Modified Urethane Ultimate Top Coat in your choice of Gloss or Matte Finish. For a high gloss finish opt for an additional top coat of clear Epoxy to add depth and protect your color coat.

You must fill in width and length

Your cutouts cannot be larger than your countertop

What color system are you using?

  • If you are using a color system we offer, select the system you want
  • Otherwise, select custom and then choose your colors

Choose your final finish

  • If you want your finish to appear shiny, then you'll select "Ultimate Top Coat Gloss Finish"
  • If you want your finish to appear softer, then you'll select "Ultimate Top Coat Matte Finish"
  • If you don't want any protective surface layer, then you'll select "No Protective Surface Needed"

WHAT IS YOUR PROJECT SURFACE?

  • If you are starting a new project over bare wood, then you'll select "New Countertop"
  • If this is a remodel of a countertop, select "Existing Countertop"
    *Remodel projects come with Bonding Primer

WHAT UNDERCOAT DO YOU NEED?

Like a tinted primer when painting walls, match the undercoat tone to your project pour for optimal bonding and color results.
  • If the final color will be dark, then you'll select "Black"
  • If the final color will be light, then you'll select "White"
    *White countertops come with Art Coat for UV protection against yellowing
  • If the final color will be grey (or similar), then you'll select "Grey"
    *Grey comes with both Black and White undercoats that you'll mix together

layout/base:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html class="no-js" lang="{{ locale_name }}">
    <head>
        <title>{{ head.title }}</title>
        {{{ resourceHints }}}
        {{{ head.meta_tags }}}
        {{{ head.config }}}
        {{#block "head"}} {{/block}}
        
        
        <!-- BEGIN Preloading first images -->
        
        {{#if product.main_image}}
        	<link rel="preload" href="{{getImage product.main_image 'product_size' (cdn theme_settings.default_image_product)}}" as="image">
        {{/if}}
        
        {{#if category.products.[0].image}}
        	<link rel="preload" href="{{getImage category.products.[0].image 'productgallery_size' (cdn theme_settings.default_image_product)}}" as="image">
        {{/if}}
        
        {{#if brand.products.[0].image}}
        	<link rel="preload" href="{{getImage brand.products.[0].image 'productgallery_size' (cdn theme_settings.default_image_product)}}" imagesrcset="{{getImageSrcset brand.products.[0].image use_default_sizes=true}}" as="image">
        {{/if}}
        
        {{#if carousel.slides.[0].stencil_image}}
        	<link rel="preload" href="{{getImageSrcset carousel.slides.[0].stencil_image 1x=(default '1280w' '160w') }}" imagesrcset="{{getImageSrcset carousel.slides.[0].stencil_image use_default_sizes=true}}" as="image">
        {{/if}}
        
        {{#if settings.request.absolute_path '===' '/'}}
	        {{#unless theme_settings.hide_shopbycategory}}
		        {{#if theme_settings.firstcategory_image}}
			        <link rel="preload" href="{{theme_settings.firstcategory_image}}" as="image">
		        {{/if}}
	        {{/unless}}
        {{/if}}
        
        <!-- END Preloading first images -->

        <link href="{{ head.favicon }}" rel="shortcut icon">
        <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, maximum-scale=1">
        <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com">
        <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com" crossorigin>
        <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@400;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">

        <!-- ICOMOON LINKS START -->
        <style type="text/css">
            @font-face {
                font-family: 'icomoon';
                src:  url('{{cdn 'assets/fonts/icomoon.eot?pdewnu'}}');
                src:  url('{{cdn 'assets/fonts/icomoon.eot?pdewnu#iefix'}}') format('embedded-opentype'),
                      url('{{cdn 'assets/fonts/icomoon.ttf?pdewnu'}}') format('truetype'),
                      url('{{cdn 'assets/fonts/icomoon.woff?pdewnu'}}') format('woff'),
                      url('{{cdn 'assets/fonts/icomoon.svg?pdewnu#icomoon'}}') format('svg');
                font-weight: normal;
                font-style: normal;
                font-display: block;
            }
        </style>
        <!-- ICOMOON LINKS END -->

        <script>
            {{!-- Change document class from no-js to js so we can detect this in css --}}
            document.documentElement.className = document.documentElement.className.replace('no-js', 'js'); 
        </script>

        {{> components/common/polyfill-script }}

        {{!-- Load Lazysizes script ASAP so images will appear --}}
        <script>
            {{!-- Only load visible elements until the onload event fires, after which preload nearby elements. --}}
            window.lazySizesConfig = window.lazySizesConfig || {};
            window.lazySizesConfig.loadMode = 1;
        </script>
        <script async src="{{cdn 'assets/dist/theme-bundle.head_async.js' resourceHint='preload' as='script'}}"></script>

        {{ getFontsCollection }}
        
        {{{stylesheet '/assets/css/theme.css'}}}

        {{{head.scripts}}}

        {{~inject 'showAdminBar' theme_settings.show-admin-bar}}
        {{~inject 'genericError' (lang 'common.generic_error')}}
        {{~inject 'maintenanceModeSettings' settings.maintenance}}
        {{~inject 'adminBarLanguage' (langJson 'admin')}}
        {{~inject 'urls' urls}}
        {{~inject 'secureBaseUrl' settings.secure_base_url}}
        {{~inject 'cartId' cart_id}}
        {{~inject 'channelId' settings.channel_id}}
        {{~inject 'template' template}}
        {{#if template_file '==' 'pages/cart'}}
            <meta name="robots" content="noindex">
            <meta name="googlebot" content="noindex">
        {{/if}}
        {{#if template_file '==' 'pages/auth/login'}}
            <meta name="robots" content="noindex">
            <meta name="googlebot" content="noindex">
        {{/if}}
        {{#if template_file '==' 'pages/checkout'}}
            <meta name="robots" content="noindex">
            <meta name="googlebot" content="noindex">
        {{/if}}
        <link rel="preload" as="image" href="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAP///wAAACH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAICRAEAOw==" imagesrcset="https://cdn11.bigcommerce.com/s-7wjguu0pvo/images/stencil/original/image-manager/scc-flooring-category-528x235.jpg">
    </head>
    <body class="{{theme_settings.current-style}} {{page_type}}">
        
        <svg data-src="{{cdn 'img/icon-sprite.svg'}}" class="icons-svg-sprite"></svg>

        {{> components/elevate/header }}
        {{> components/elevate/body }}
        {{> components/elevate/footer }}

        <script>window.__webpack_public_path__ = "{{cdn 'assets/dist/'}}";</script>
        <script src="{{cdn 'assets/dist/theme-bundle.main.js' resourceHint='preload' as='script'}}"></script>
        <script>
            {{!-- Exported in app.js --}}
            window.stencilBootstrap("{{page_type}}", {{jsContext}}).load();
        </script>

        {{{footer.scripts}}}
        
        <script>
            document.querySelectorAll(".navPage-subMenu").forEach(menu => {
                if (window.innerWidth <= 800) {
                    menu.classList.add("is-open")
                } else {
                    menu.classList.remove("is-open");
                }
            });
            
            document.querySelectorAll(".navPage-childList").forEach(child => {
                if (window.innerWidth <= 800) {
                    child.classList.add("is-open")
                } else {
                    child.classList.remove("is-open");
                }
            });
            
            document.querySelectorAll(".has-subMenu").forEach(menu => {
                if (window.innerWidth <= 800) {
                    menu.addEventListener("hover", function(e) {
                        e.preventDefault();
                        
                        menu.classList.remove("is-open");
                    });
                }
            });
            
            window.addEventListener("resize", function() {
                document.querySelectorAll(".navPage-subMenu").forEach(menu => {
                    if (window.innerWidth <= 800) {
                        menu.classList.add("is-open")
                    } else {
                        menu.classList.remove("is-open");
                    }
                });
                
                document.querySelectorAll(".navPage-childList").forEach(child => {
                    if (window.innerWidth <= 800) {
                        child.classList.add("is-open")
                    } else {
                        child.classList.remove("is-open");
                    }
                });
                
                document.querySelectorAll(".has-subMenu").forEach(menu => {
                if (window.innerWidth <= 800) {
                    menu.addEventListener("hover", function(e) {
                        e.preventDefault();
                        
                        menu.classList.remove("is-open");
                    });
                }
            });
            });
        </script>
        
        
        <script>
            // overwrite h2 color on international orders page only
            if (window.location.pathname === '/international-orders') document.querySelectorAll('h2').forEach(h2 => h2.setAttribute('style', 'color: #fff !important'));
        </script>
    </body>
</html>
